item.title: Intro to IoT
item.description: IoT Any reference books? 21 IoT Experiments - labs are all based on this 15 bucks on kindle Raspberry Pi IoT Projects: Prototyping experiments for makers Additional reference book ...

item.title: FL Tips (1)
item.description: Killer free plugins Synth1: Free and with a huge number of presets available. I don’t use this one too much but I know people who use it religiously Wider: 1-knob stereo enhancer.

item.title: Procedurally generated levels
item.description: My first attempt at generating dungeon-like levels. Most of my work was based on this video with a few changes. Procedure In the inspector I manually sort each room into separate lists based on the number of exits they each have.

item.title: Blockade Runner
item.description: Blockade Runner was a submission to Newgrounds’ List Jam and was developed over a weekend. Originally I wasn’t really interested in participating, but then… The main theme of the game was made in one sitting on the first day of the jam - but it wasn’t made with the jam in mind! It ended up being such an inspiration that the rest of the game came into being solely so I could have something cool to showcase the track with.

item.title: OBLITERATOR
item.description: (Volume warning) OVERVIEW Top-down design (world and lore drive gameplay) Set in an endless maze of gothic architecture and crushing religious weight The player is practically ...

item.title: Welcome
item.description: You’ve entered my extra-special subdomain. Here you’ll find behind the scenes looks at various solo projects I’m working on (and have worked on). I hope to write a few tutorial posts to shed some light on various programming and music tricks I’ve learned over the years.
